sentence.Network_en: Wallpapers for children too often come only in sickly pastel shades.
sentence.Network_cn: 给孩子们用的墙纸往往颜色苍白暗淡。

sentence.Network_en: He had a sickly green pallor.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 综合英语单词表(第二册上) - 豆丁网 ... severe a. 严酷的 sickly a. 多病的， 不健康的 soak vt. 浸湿， 泡.
六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... sickle n. 镰刀 sickly a. 病弱的,阴沉的,无精打采的 sieve n. 筛，滤杓.
大学英语精读六 - 豆丁网 ... monster 怪物；畸形的动植物 sickly 有病的，苍白 agony 苦恼，极大痛苦.
综合英语二上册... ... rightful a.正义的；合法的六级词汇 sickly a.多病的；病态的四级词汇 blessed a.享福的；神圣的四级词汇.

list.abs: The eggs looked a little sickly , he was convinced he had damaged beyond repair ., 卵子看起来有些病态 , 他以为已被自己损坏了.
his face was a sickly yellow ., 他的脸色是一种病态的黄.
Puma was transformed from a sickly feline into a magnificent beast ., 彪马从一只病猫变成一头真正的猛兽.
Puma was transformed from a sickly feline into a magnificent beast ., 彪马从一只病猫变成一头真正的猛兽.
excuses for non unknown , and are recovered Sumerian letters [ citation needed ] that complain of sickly goats , sheep that had already been fleeced , etc .已经发现的苏美尔人的书信【须引证】中有对病羊，或者被剪毛的绵羊等等的抱怨。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: probably suggested by Old Norse sjúkligr

entry.tran: 常生病的;虚弱的;健康欠佳的
entry.def: A sickly person or animal is weak, unhealthy, and often ill.

example.ex: He had been a sickly child.
example.tran: 他曾是个体弱多病的孩子。

entry.tran: (通常指因为太甜而)让人恶心的，令人作呕的
entry.def: A sickly smell or taste is unpleasant and makes you feel slightly sick, often because it is extremely sweet.

example.tran: 朗姆酒甜得发腻的气味

entry.tran: (颜色、灯光等)暗淡的，苍白的，微弱的
entry.def: A sickly colour or light is unpleasantly pale or weak.

example.ex: Wallpapers for children too often come only in sickly pastel shades.
example.tran: 给孩子们用的墙纸往往颜色苍白暗淡。

means.word_mean: 2. somewhat ill or prone to illness;

sentences.sentence: "is unwell and can't come to work"
